I am a third year Software Engineering student at the University of Waterloo. My overarching goals have remained the same for many years: to be simply a good, earnest person whom can be relied upon and to never stop learning.

On this website you can learn more about the projects I have been working on. Eventually I will also start blogging.

Outside of school I enjoy reading, catching up on the latest world news, and exploring mind-blowing topics relevant to my field on Coursera and edX. Currently I am also learning photography and playing the guitar.

My website is being rebuilt using Jekyll at the moment so pages may not look nicely as they should.
